ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera Body (Black) + <2> Nikon 18-140mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <5> Spare EN-EL14 Battery + <6> Battery Charger +
<7> PD 67mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <8> Battery Grip for D5100 & D5200 + <9> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <12> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera Body with 18-140mm VR Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Grip + Battery/Charger + Remote + Filter Kit
